description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an in-depth research experience.
Emphasis is placed on the iterative process of experimentation and analysis.  Students interested
in independent research may enroll in CHEM 297 or CHEM 398.  Each course requires a faculty
supervisor, who will make the decision as to which course is appropriate.  This course can only be
taken Pass or No Pass (P/N) and not for a grade.  Offered each term.  Prerequisite: permission of
